DataElement.preferredName: Subject Age Greater Than or Equal To 18 Year Eligibility Determination Result
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response to an eligibility inclusion criterion pertaining to a subject's age being equal to or greater than 18 years.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Subject Age Greater Than or Equal To Integer::18 Year Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A number with no fractional part.::18_The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.

Property.preferredName: Age Greater Than or Equal To Integer::18 Year Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A number with no fractional part.::18:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.
